rows.title: What type of crypto currencies do you accept?
rows.content: Currently we accept Bitcoin (BTC), LiteCoin (LTC), DogeCoin (DOGE) and USDT. We are going to add more coins in the near future.

rows.title: Can i pay with credit card or PayPal?
rows.content: Payments with credit card and PayPal will be possible in the near future.

rows.title: What is NOWPayments?
rows.content: NOWPayments is a crypto payment gateaway, more info at NOWPayments.com

rows.title: Can i purchase a subscription to access all traders at once?
Why do traders have different pricings from one another?
rows.content: Pricings are directly managed by the trader, We do not control them.

rows.title: Does cheaper mean less effective?
rows.content: No, the prices are not based on the skill level of the trader.
